settings.template_description:
Testosterone is a hormone in the body that is responsible for muscle growth and maintenance. Different people produce varying amounts of this essential hormone, so it’s crucial to supplement it for those who feel they lack that boost, just like any other nutrient in the body.  

Balancing testosterone levels in the body provides numerous health benefits, such as increased strength, libido, and immune response.

settings.heading: Benefits
settings.content:
• Increases muscular strength
  • Enhances libido
  • Improves athletic performance
  • Supports immune system

settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.content: Magnesium (as Magnesium Oxide), Zinc (as Zinc Oxide), Tribulus Terrestris (fruit), Chrysin (seed), Horny Goat Weed (aerial), Longjack (root), Saw palmetto Berries, Hawthorn Berries, Cissus Quadrangularis (stem), Cellulose (vegetable capsule), Rice Flour, Magnesium Stearate.

settings.heading: Warning
settings.content: Consult with a physician before use if you have any medical conditions. Do not use if pregnant or lactating.

settings.heading: + Lean muscle mass
settings.text: Testosterone is known to promote lean muscle growth, which controls weight and increases energy.

settings.heading: + Increases bone density
settings.text: Bone density decreases with lower testosterone levels. Supplementing with testosterone will prevent this.

settings.heading: + Cardiovascular health
settings.text: Testosterone aids in producing red blood cells for a healthier heart and blood flow.

settings.heading: + Higher libido
settings.text: Higher levels of testosterone are linked to increased sexual activity.

settings.title: Incredible strength gains
settings.text: I've been using this testosterone booster for a few months now, and my strength has increased significantly. I can lift heavier weights and recover faster.
settings.author: Tom H.

settings.title: Helped boost my libido
settings.text: This supplement has really helped boost my libido and overall energy levels. I feel more alive and active throughout the day, which was exactly what I was looking for. Will buy again.
settings.author: Jake P.

settings.title: Good product
settings.text: I wasn’t too sure about using testosterone, but one of my friends did, and his experience was very positive. Now I can see why! My fitness has improved noticeably and I can push myself harder during workouts, which I love.
settings.author: Rakim J.

settings.title: Quick delivery
settings.text: I got a subscription and received my pills quickly. Can’t wait to see the results
settings.author: Raffael M.

settings.title: This product has made a big difference
settings.text: I've always struggled to build lean muscle, but this product has made a big difference. I'm seeing more definition and muscle growth than ever before. Will be ordering the subscription.
settings.author: Lucas P.

settings.heading: What's the shipping cost?
settings.row_content: On average all order shipping costs are 4.5$ to any state in the US. International shipping costs may vary.

settings.heading: When will I receive my products?
settings.row_content:
All products are shipped out from our fulfilment center within 4-6 business days and on average it takes 1-5 business days to deliver your order. If things go smoothly, you place your order on Monday you should receive it by Friday the same week.

Every now and then, such as holiday seasons, there may be a delay on orders due to the high volume coming in within such a short time period. We value being transparent with our customers, so please be patient as we are a small team doing the best we can! Thanks for your understanding.

settings.heading: What's your return policy?
settings.row_content: In case you receive a product that has been damaged during shipment we will automatically ship out new product for you or issue a full refund. Refer to refund policy on footer of page. If you cancel a non subscription before the order is confirmed to ship you will be issued a full refund. Subscription items can be referred to in subscription policy in footer.

settings.heading: Where are the products manufactured?
settings.row_content: This product is produced under strict quality control standards, ensuring you receive a premium product every time.

settings.heading: Can I track my order?
settings.row_content: Once you will make a purchase and your order will be confirmed, we will send out an order tracking link.

settings.text: We have a no-questions-asked returns policy. Just drop us a line within 30 days and consider it done.

settings.title: Getting started
settings.text: The first 1-3 months are the most challenging. Its critical to stay consistent and disiciplined.

settings.title: First results
settings.text: In the 3-6 months period you will start seeing first results and feel much better.

settings.title: Long lasting
settings.text: Keep your routine going. Remember that you can loose everything in just one day.
